metadata.title: USN-6757-1 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled PHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS variable. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code. This issue only affected Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, and Ubuntu 22.04 LTS. (CVE-2022-4900)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain cookies. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cookie by pass. (CVE-2024-2756)  It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled some passwords. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause an account takeover attack. (CVE-2024-3096)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6757-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php7.0-cgi - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-mcrypt - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-xsl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-fpm - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-phpdbg - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-curl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-ldap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-mbstring - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-gmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-gd - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-common - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-enchant - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-soap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-odbc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-cli - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-json - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-pgsql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-zip - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-mysql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-dba - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-sqlite3 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-sybase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-pspell - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-xml - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-recode - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-dev - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-tidy - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-interbase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-opcache - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-readline - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-intl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-imap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-xmlrpc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 php7.0-snmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
